arrive.content: You arrive at Baba Yaga's house.
options: Knock on the Door and Introduce Yourself

hide.content: Baba Yaga enters her hut and spots you.

introduce.content: You introduce yourself to Baba Yaga. You tell her your situation and she agrees to give you the light if you complete her tasks.

refusetasks.content: Your stepmother or Baba Yaga won't take nicely to this.

accept-tasks.content: Baba Yaga asks her to carry to her, her lunch.

supperdrop.content: You drop the bowl and it's contents spills on the floor.

righthand.content:
You give her her lunch.
You are instructed to tidy the pots, sweep the yard and clean the hut.

failtask.content: You have chosen the wrong choice and failed the task. Baba Yaga is hungry and is not impressed by your failure.

tidyyard.content: It's time to clean the yard. How do you do it?

cleanhut.content: You are instructed to clean Baba Yaga's house.

tidypots.content: Baba Yaga has instructed you to tidy and clean her pots.
options: Clean the pots with a mop.

sortseeds.content: You have to sort out the seeds into two piles. Black and Yellow. There must be over  a million of those here.

doneseeds.content: baba yaga impressed. wow! you gotta make pea soup and fill up this bucket of water using this sift.

makepeasoup.content: you gotta make pea soup and sort out all of these peas. OOF!

sortedpeas.content: You've sorted out the peas with the help of the doll but now you have to fill the bucket of water with the sieve.

bucketfilled.content:
Baba Yaga is impressed. She instructs you to count all the stars in the night sky.
How will you do this?

foundstars.content:
Baba Yaga wakes to find you. You tell her the number of stars in the night sky. She is outrages.
"Who told you?" she demands.
You remind her that she owes you a light. You comply.
